moves.name: Confusion
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target confused.

moves.name: X Defense
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Stand Together!
moves.effect: Raises the Defense and Speed of all allied sync pairs by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.effect: The more damage dealt to the target, the more this move restores the user’s HP.

passives.name: Lithe
passives.description: Prevents the user from getting paralyzed.

passives.name: Natural Remedy
passives.description: Removes all status conditions from the user the first time it is inflicted by any status condition each battle.

passives.name: Quick Cure
passives.description: Removes the confused, flinching, and trapped conditions from the user the first time they are inflicted each battle.
